Sentencas: Y-doped BaZrO3 is a promising proton conductor for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: In this work, a combination of static DFT calculations and DFT based molecular dynamics (DFT-MD) was used to study proton conduction in this material.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: Geometry optimizations of 100 structures with a 12.5% dopant concentration allowed us to identify a clear correlation between the bending of the metal-oxygen-metal angle and the energies of the simulated cells.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: Depending on the type of bending, two configurations, designated as inward bending and outward bending, were defined.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that a larger bending decreases the energy and that the lowest energies are observed for structures combining inward bending with protons being close to the dopant atoms.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: These lowest energy structures are the ones with the strongest hydrogen bonds.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: DFT-MD simulations in cells with different yttrium distributions provide complementary microscopic information on proton diffusion as they capture the dynamic distortions of the lattice caused by thermal motion.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: A careful analysis of the proton jumps between different environments confirmed that the inward and outward bending states are relevant for the understanding of proton diffusion.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: Indeed, intra-octahedral jumps were shown to only occur starting from an outward configuration while the inward configuration seems to favor rotations around the oxygen.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: On average, in the DFT-MD simulations, the hydrogen bond lengths are shorter for the outward configuration which facilitates the intra-octahedral jumps.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3

Sentencas: Diffusion coefficients and activation energies were also determined and compared to previous theoretical and experimental data, showing a good agreement with previous data measuring local proton motion.
Titulo: Local Distortions and Dynamics in Hydrated Y-Doped BaZrO3
